channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: States and Startups Are Suing the US Nuclear Regulatory Commission
item.description: Critics of the NRC say its red tape and lengthy authorization timelines stifle innovation, but handing some of its responsibilities to states could un...

item.title: Millions of Apple Airplay-Enabled Devices Can Be Hacked via Wi-Fi
item.description: Researchers reveal a collection of bugs known as AirBorne that would allow any hacker on the same Wi-Fi network as a third-party AirPlay-enabled devic...

item.title: Meta launches a standalone AI app to compete with ChatGPT
item.description: After integrating Meta AI into WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, and Messenger, Meta is rolling out a standalone AI app. Unveiled at Meta’s LlamaCon even...

item.title: 12 Best Delivery Chocolate Boxes to Send and Receive (2025)
item.description: We tasted dozens of chocolate boxes to find the best, from pure chocolate ecstasy to bundles of fun.

item.title: Asus Vivobook Pro 15 Review: For Creators and Gamers
item.description: Asus’ 15-inch laptop is an uninspiring machine built for creators.

item.title: Indian court orders blocking of Proton Mail
item.description: The ruling, which has yet to take effect, was ordered under India's online blocking laws.

item.title: Spotify adds 5M premium users and hits record operating income
item.description: Spotify reported on Tuesday that its premium subscriber base grew by 5 million in the first quarter, representing a 12% increase year-over-year. This ...

item.title: Meta needs to win over AI developers at its first LlamaCon
item.description: On Tuesday, Meta is hosting its first-ever LlamaCon AI developer conference at its Menlo Park headquarters, where the company will try to pitch develo...

item.title: HelloFresh Meal Kit Review (2025): Modern and Tasty, With Caveats
item.description: One of the oldest and biggest meal kits often feels the brightest and most modern. Little missteps hold some recipes back.

item.title: The deadline to book your exhibit table for TechCrunch Sessions: AI is May 9
item.description: We’re in the final stretch. TechCrunch Sessions: AI takes over Zellerbach Hall in almost a month, and the exhibit floor is almost completely booked. I...
